channel.title: Interfaces[317]

item.title: Interfaces[317]
item.dc:creator: @DavidDavidson DavidDavidson
item.description:
@DavidDavidson wrote:

Hi,
I was wondering if it is possible to change where an interface opens, because the ones like chose an option, or chose an amount at the moment open at the top.

Here is my current code

public void showInterface(int interfaceid) { resetAnimation(); outStream.createFrame(97); outStream.writeWord(interfaceid); flushOutStream(); }

I was wondering, is it the outStream.createFrame(#); and if so, what should i change it to so they open at the bottom?

Read full topic
